firmpresentation.supertitle: of Artificial Intelligence in the Service of Art.
firmpresentation.supertitledesc: puts AI at the service of art professionals. Expertly analyze, adjust your estimation, and increase your creativity!

pricing.newofferdesc: Free trial for 7 days to familiarize yourself with the features of
pricing.passionatedesc: Ideal for art enthusiasts curious about an artist or the value of a work.
pricing.expertdesc: Businesses or experts with significant needs requiring a bespoke offer.

infoband.title: Who Our Solution Is For ?
infoband.passionatedesc: Individuals curious about the art world, having artworks to appraise, in the context of an acquisition or inheritance.
infoband.expertdesc: Experts wanting to evaluate an artwork, share references with clients, or simply cross-check their estimation in seconds.
infoband.commissairedesc: Auctioneers organizing sales for any art object, wanting to validate the estimates of their sale and then organize it in the best way.

product.supertitle: A Platform to Unleash the Potential of Data, Art, and AI
product.superdesc: The art market is decentralized. Traditional tools are no longer sufficient. Only artificial intelligence allows you to quickly contextualize an artwork, compare it to recent global sales, interpret its valuation, and optimize your sale.
product.descautomatiestim: Search by submitting a simple image or detailed description, AI will find the corresponding pieces and associated prices.
product.sol3automatiestim: Past prices explained by geolocation, date, etc.
product.titlesearch: Intelligently Search Your Artworks in Over 10 Million Articles
product.descsearch: Search for all artworks by an artist, or any artwork similar to yours using fine criteria.
product.sol2search: Search by fine criteria, material, dimensions, etc.
product.sol3search: Trend analysis, artist revenue, and more
product.descoptim: Thanks to our optimization engine, you can now optimize the organization of your lots within the sale to best sell each lot while minimizing the number of unsold lots.
product.pain3optim: Limited view of your sale's potential
product.sol1optim: Sales organization tool to maximize your revenue
product.sol3optim: Statistical estimation of what your sale would yield
product.sol4optim: Optimizer adjustment based on your past sales results
